name: Arcade Archives CRAZY CLIMBER
description:
CRAZY CLIMBER is an action game for arcade game produced by Nichibutsu in 1980.
'Players control the right hand and left hand of the twin lever to overcome various obstacles and climb to the top of the skyscraper.

Additional hardware required for Remote Play.

1-2 players
DUALSHOCK®4
Remote Play
1080i HD Video Output

Software subject to license (us.playstation.com/softwarelicense). Online activity subject to Terms of Services and User Agreement (www.playstationnetwork.com/terms-of-service).
